data.text:
Watch live as Day 2 of the #UNGA General Debate gets underway. 

https://t.co/Am1xAQoXQO

Many thanks to all the hardworking members of the #NYPD family that are working long hours to ensure our safety & keeping things moving this week in & around #UNGA. We salute you! https://t.co/zdjQwkwG2T
Countries promise decade of action and delivery for people and planet at first-ever #Global Goals Summit. https://t.co/9f84GIXZ8M #UNGA https://t.co/AvFdWLmOKr
All week we're taking you backstage at #UNGA in NYC, the biggest event in global politics. More from @UN_Photo: https://t.co/x40VwnTsRT https://t.co/mdO4aUdKUW

The General Debate, #GlobalGoals & more were all part of the #UNGA action on Tuesday.

Catch up on what happened in this @Twitter moment. https://t.co/b6wLOGAkyF

A direct consequence of hate speech on the grounds of sexual orientation & gender identity is that LGBTI people face increased risk of stigma, discrimination & violence. 

We need to work more to fight it. 
– @unhumanrights chief @mbachelet at #UNGA.

https://t.co/398IPFnDW8 https://t.co/QPuwbzg9Qs

"In an ever more divided world, we need a strong United Nations. The problems we face are real. But so is hope."

-- @antonioguterres at opening of #UNGA General Debate. https://t.co/wyP5amcrNP https://t.co/AXFXa0Z5Mq
We’re on @GIPHY! Check out our #UNGA, #GlobalGoals and #ClimateAction gifs ➡️ https://t.co/hCPzixt7mJ https://t.co/hZH9aBT6sQ

@jlprdeangola @marcelorebelo_ @PaulKagame @niinisto @GovMonaco @IssoufouMhm @koninklijkhuis @mauriciomacri @valstsgriba @ZuzanaCaputova @TokayevKZ @prezydentpl @MartinVizcarraC @Macky_Sall Stay tuned - more #UNGA speakers coming up: Italy: @GiuseppeConteIT, Spain: @sanchezcastejon, New Zealand: @jacindaardern, Japan: @JPN_PMO, United Kingdom: @10DowningStreet, Morocco: @Elotmanisaad. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

Tuesday at #UNGA: World leaders took the stage at the General Debate & shared solutions for achieving the #GlobalGoals.

Watch what happened. https://t.co/PuJCcsotF0

@jlprdeangola @marcelorebelo_ @PaulKagame @niinisto @GovMonaco @IssoufouMhm @koninklijkhuis @mauriciomacri More speakers to watch for at #UNGA: Latvia: @valstsgriba, Slovakia: @ZuzanaCaputova, Kazakhstan: @TokayevKZ, Poland: @prezydentpl, Liechtenstein, Peru: @MartinVizcarraC, Senegal: @Macky_Sall. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
Global challenges require global solutions. @UNSGSA Queen Máxima is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/V5Px0LRHOU
Global challenges require global solutions. @iccsecgen is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/kNpzMturjv

UN @Refugees Agency Goodwill Ambassador @EmiThePoet is raising her voice at #UNGA.

Achieving the #GlobalGoals means improving the lives of millions of refugees! https://t.co/uPQZQ7zb6r
.@philipogola is at #UNGA to support #GlobalGoals and #ClimateAction for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/s45xqTd6HN https://t.co/2TjnaGnV07

"We must step up our efforts. And we must do it now. We must regain the trust of the people."

-- @antonioguterres calls for decade of action to achieve #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/bFMcpYIeUV #UNGA https://t.co/9e94sReEin

Speaking this afternoon at #UNGA: Angola: @jlprdeangola, Portugal: @marcelorebelo_, Rwanda: @PaulKagame, Finland: @niinisto, Monaco: @GovMonaco. Also, Niger: @IssoufouMhm, Netherlands: @koninklijkhuis
and Argentina: @mauriciomacri. See: https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
The #UNGA General Debate continues - watch it live.   https://t.co/sYAqS7NybI
Global challenges require global solutions. @AranchaGlezLaya from @ITCnews is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/JXydEv0vP6

The 30th anniversary of the Convention on the Rights of the Child is a reminder that children are facing a new set of challenges. They have already created movements in search of solutions. @unicefchief wants world leaders at #UNGA to put #ChildRights first. #ForEveryChild https://t.co/l62hTh2q3U
Global challenges require global solutions. @srwestin and Basma from @SesameWorkshop are at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/K9u83IcpdI
.@UNReliefChief is at #UNGA to support #ClimateAction for people and planet. https://t.co/s45xqTd6HN https://t.co/38XYTYIUZm

@jairbolsonaro @POTUS @AlsisiOfficial @RTErdogan @MBuhari @ibusolih @TamimBinHamad Speaking at #UNGA: Croatia: @GrabarKolinda, Bolivia: @evoespueblo, Jordan: @KingAbdullahII, Republic of Korea: @moonriver365, Burkina Faso: @rochkaborepf, France: @EmmanuelMacron, Chile: @sebastianpinera. Bosnia & Herzegovina. See: https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

Behind-the-scenes at #UNGA:

Andra Levite, the first lady of Latvia stopped by our VIP Social Media Studio to see this beautiful tapestry called "Hope", donated to the UN by @LatviaUN_NY. https://t.co/BxtAEduZjC

"We are here to serve. We are here to advance the common good while upholding our shared humanity and values."

-- @antonioguterres to world leaders opening of #UNGA General Debate. https://t.co/wyP5amcrNP https://t.co/mHA7CyehE9
More than 560 multilateral treaties are open for participation Tuesday at the Annual Treaty Event during #UNGA. More: https://t.co/kK0QYyvWzg. https://t.co/kB6oLRp7Tp

Speaking at #UNGA this morning: Brazil: @jairbolsonaro, USA: @POTUS, Egypt: @AlsisiOfficial, Turkey: @RTErdogan, Nigeria: @MBuhari, Maldives: @ibusolih, as well as Qatar: @TamimBinHamad and Switzerland. See: https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
The race against the climate crisis is a race we can win.Germany’s @SvenjaSchulze68 is at the UN #ClimateAction Summit. https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA https://t.co/DXOGNFUjP5
The #UNGA General Debate is underway - watch it live. https://t.co/isqqzAo2TD
#UNGA General Debate kicks off this morning with @antonioguterres & more: https://t.co/WdhsaJh45S https://t.co/yJqryCpzHb

We need more investment & more political action to achieve sustainable & inclusive growth that leaves no one behind.

-- @antonioguterres ahead of Tuesday's #GlobalGoals Summit https://t.co/bFMcpYIeUV https://t.co/9hYRTEIqW7
The race against the climate crisis is a race we can win. @UNGeneva's @UN_Valovaya is at the UN #ClimateAction Summit in New York. https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA https://t.co/OpLkXHSrrD

Go backstage at the biggest event in global politics.

UNGA in pictures from @UN_Photo. https://t.co/9BGHr93CcE https://t.co/bwwaP2E1c6
UN #ClimateAction Summit delivers major step up in national ambition and private sector action to protect our planet and all its people. https://t.co/LSqjeI5z0R https://t.co/K80TEXw1zL

"Health for all is an investment in people, in their well-being, and in healthy and prosperous societies."

-- @antonioguterres at UN High-Level #HealthForAll meeting https://t.co/VlrA8ZrCEp https://t.co/6ZWkC0qMKK

"Right here, right now is where we draw the line. The world is waking up - and change is coming."

-- @GretaThunberg addresses world leaders at UN #ClimateAction Summit. https://t.co/g4uXzT9aRM https://t.co/4nEpUF65Lj
Countries discussed their commitments to #ClimateAction and #HealthForAll at #UNGA in Monday. Watch what happened. https://t.co/wuMvy2g6OJ

"It is my obligation – our obligation – to do everything to stop the climate crisis before it stops us."

-- @antonioguterres at UN #ClimateAction Summit https://t.co/soNk7cksMo https://t.co/LpcL6wKtGt

In order to tackle the global climate emergency, we must set our ambitions higher and turn ideas into actions.

Monday's UN #ClimateAction Summit has delivered a surge in momentum & cooperation to protect our planet. https://t.co/dre14NVtJ2 https://t.co/MIMcMOziJK
Global challenges require global solutions. Ireland’s @SimonHarrisTD is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/UEcxroJFQo
Global challenges require global solutions. @ctbto_alerts ‘s @SinaZerbo is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/MaTMbHUg3K
Global challenges require global solutions. @AlokSharma_RDG Secretary of State for @DFID_UK is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/wfOju0uWy7

"While the situation is not good & the planet is suffering, the window of opportunity is still open despite everything. Let us not let it close. Let us open it with our determination."- His Holiness Pope Francis (@Pontifex) in message to UN Climate Summit. https://t.co/h2h63STvpX https://t.co/8UAWtvEY4B
Global challenges require global solutions. @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador @bertrandpiccard is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/WRzKI9aZlU
Global challenges require global solutions. @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador @rockydawuni is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/c25ftnt5ze
The race against the climate crisis is a race we can win. @Danone’s @EmmanuelFaber is at the UN #ClimateAction Summit in New York. https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA https://t.co/kakHG2gr6s

The race against the climate crisis is a race we can win.

SDG Advocate & @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador @deespeak is at the UN #ClimateAction Summit. https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA #GlobalGoals https://t.co/hAel4adO7Q
At the #ClimateAction Summit, 41 countries & 71 local governments representing 627+ million people have committed to clean air by 2030. https://t.co/E4TyFKtuKX https://t.co/JhoVxhqbGw
.@UICC ‘s @dinamired is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/v4dNhy22BH https://t.co/JcU4CULrYY

"The eyes of all future generations are upon you. And if you choose to fail us, I say we will never forgive you."

-- @GretaThunberg at UN #ClimateAction Summit. https://t.co/g4uXzT9aRM https://t.co/2nBzFxsnxP

"Nature is angry - and we fool ourselves if we think we can fool nature because nature always strikes back - and around the world, nature is striking back with fury.  

-- @antonioguterres at UN #ClimateAction Summit https://t.co/gqotEIFsMO https://t.co/60krARBNwE
.@OSCE's @gremingerosce is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/v4dNhy22BH https://t.co/Ua5LzssoQy
Watch live as world leaders gather at UNHQ in NYC to share their #ClimateAction commitments to protect people and planet. https://t.co/pLD8Ozb0Vj
.@BentHHoyre is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/v4dNhy22BH https://t.co/MgznspOumD
Watch live as world leaders gather at UNHQ in NYC to share their #ClimateAction commitments to protect people and planet. https://t.co/IhXHJXcm2L

Universal health coverage means ensuring all people have access to the quality health services they need - when & where they need them. 

World leaders are meeting at #UNGA Monday to help make #HealthForAll a reality. https://t.co/VlrA8ZrCEp https://t.co/nWgJlRVN20

Monday's UN #ClimateAction Summit is set to demonstrate a surge of engagement to reduce emissions and protect people against increasing impacts of the global climate emergency. https://t.co/0o0ibuT3XY https://t.co/1DZizXguvK

From wherever you are in the 🌍🌏🌎, now's your chance to join #UNGA.

Tap below to see live videos & latest updates as world leaders converge on UNHQ in NYC.

https://t.co/6USmHsNtVW

Look out for special updates this #UNGA week from our VIP Social Media Studio where world leaders, celebrities and influencers stop by to discuss global solutions to global challenges. https://t.co/SoR2GrroDw https://t.co/Gwh8tuIhYL

"On this International Day of Sign Languages, let us reaffirm our commitment to advancing the rights of deaf people everywhere. " -- @antonioguterres. https://t.co/xFJ3i1H7sO #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/OiqrMt3mvR

#UNGA week kicks off on Monday with high-level events on #ClimateAction #HealthForAll & much more.

Stay tuned for updates and a behind-the-scenes look at the busiest week in the diplomatic calendar! https://t.co/xWc4QNQQ6l https://t.co/hYczV75CV8

What's happening this week at #UNGA?

Follow all the action here: https://t.co/6USmHsNtVW https://t.co/966JSTKSsa

On Monday's International Sign Language Day, actor & disability advocate
@NyleDiMarco explains how access to education allows everyone to be part of the conversation on global issues. https://t.co/xFJ3i1H7sO #GlobalGoals https://t.co/a4Hw3j61VK

We are leading by example in responding to climate emergency: ahead of Monday's #ClimateAction Summit, the UN Secretariat announces plan to slash own emissions by almost half by 2030. https://t.co/pSQs2Yvm6B https://t.co/f1QhkyAO4V

Reducing emissions to protect our planet while making sure no one is left behind - that's one of the main topics of Monday's #ClimateAction Summit at UNHQ in NYC. https://t.co/dre14NDSks https://t.co/wrcaAZ8hfl

Primary health care means providing essential health services like:
💉 Immunization
🤰 Antenatal care
🏃‍ Healthy lifestyle advice
💰 Making sure people don't have to pay out of their own pockets.

It's time for #HealthForAll! https://t.co/jo2c2EIFzQ via @WHO https://t.co/A5XcdVW9pL

There has been a lot of behind-the-scenes action taking place as UNHQ in NYC gets ready for #UNGA, the busiest week on the diplomatic calendar.

More 📸 from @UN_Photo: https://t.co/hEGOY3wstP https://t.co/Xbk7RyzFRV

We hope States, cities and businesses will announce lots of concrete measures. -- @antonioguterres on his expectations for Monday's UN #ClimateAction Summit. https://t.co/dre14NVtJ2 https://t.co/SdohFYVcNm

Climate change impacts are hitting harder & sooner than predicted.

New #UnitedinScience report underlines gap between #ClimateAction targets & reality, and shows urgency of the transformation urgently needed to protect our planet. https://t.co/DPKoUqqPnI https://t.co/YukQDJf0lN

Young activists, innovators, entrepreneurs & change-makers are calling for #ClimateAction.

Watch as they share their ideas & initiatives at the #SDGLive space at UN Headquarters: https://t.co/SxiIRo2V1l https://t.co/npJNFprgOC

Monday's #ClimateAction Summit will show what climate leadership looks like. Follow along as leaders from around the world increase their climate ambition to save our planet and our future. https://t.co/dre14NVtJ2 https://t.co/RyAfkdoBh2

The race against the climate crisis is a race we can win.

@OlaElvestuen and one of Norway's youth delegates are at #UNGA, calling for urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/wnVxdsDhfU https://t.co/eyrJtiDkFA
Preserving forests is vital for the well-being of the planet and for effective #ClimateAction. https://t.co/UqYWRsZrWf via @unredd https://t.co/BhMmGH9ysL

Ant Forest, a green initiative, is one of this year's @UNEnvironment #EarthChamps!

Find out more & get inspired to take #ClimateAction! https://t.co/E9DucvWVKw https://t.co/jCzz2pHlzv

"The oceans need protecting and the young people of today are going to benefit from this in the future." -- Olympian & @UNICEF Pacific Ambassador @PitaTofua is at #UNGA to call for urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/wnVxdsDhfU https://t.co/s1lcrsWHD2

The race against the climate crisis is a race we can win.

@OonaCC is at the UN to join young people from around the world calling for urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/wnVxdsDhfU https://t.co/jYmRQdW8wA

Young people came to UNHQ in NYC on Saturday to call on world leaders to step up and take urgent #ClimateAction to protect the planet. 
https://t.co/wnVxdsDhfU https://t.co/G1aR5HuD6Q

The race against the climate crisis is a race we can win. 

@AidanRGallagher is at the UN to join young people from around the world calling for urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/wnVxdsDhfU https://t.co/lONfHoPcZU
Watch live now: @antonioguterres is taking questions & talking with @AidanRGallagher live on @Instagram ahead of this week's #UNGA activities ➡ https://t.co/coM1gcf9if https://t.co/hnHlwEFPEK

A peaceful society is one where there is justice and equality for everyone. We can all be part of the solution. #StandUp4HumanRights on Saturday's #PeaceDay: https://t.co/pxI8P0Rwmv https://t.co/jAXRcbswvq

The #UNGA high-level week gets underway Monday. Check out all the ways you can follow the action on @Twitter in these languages!

French @ONU_fr
Spanish @ONU_es
Russian @UnitedNationsRU
Arabic @UNarabic
Portugese @NacoesUnidas
Kiswahili @UmojaWaMataifa
Hindi @UNinHindi https://t.co/Kmc7aY6w1W

Being physically active is one of the best ways to stay healthy.

Join the #HealthForAll challenge with @WHO in New York on 22 September, or add your voice here: https://t.co/tNyt9KrHqX https://t.co/JJ8UDWnGNu

People around the 🌎 are taking action for peace in different ways, including through #ClimateAction.

On Saturday's #PeaceDay, find out how you can contribute to a more peaceful world : https://t.co/eSz3GOyLKA https://t.co/ihJN7QkVjL

Young people have been at the forefront of demanding that world leaders address the climate crisis, says @antonioguterres.

More from the Secretary-General on the importance of Saturday's Youth #ClimateAction Summit: https://t.co/c98TT3C4ID https://t.co/WHxDwId6yf

📷: @antonioguterres rings the peace bell at UNHQ in NYC.

The theme for Saturday's #PeaceDay is #ClimateAction for Peace. See how you can help protect our 🌎 to promote peace. https://t.co/QgoUzZaIm5 https://t.co/SAKT7USa4h

From #ClimateAction to the #GlobalGoals, see what Secretary-General @antonioguterres had to say about some of the most pressing challenges facing the world today in this @Twitter Moment. https://t.co/StN9ElctOj

Ahead of next week's #ClimateAction Summit, @NZUN & partners brought to life the "Voices for the Future" immersive art installation projected onto UNHQ in NYC to highlight the urgent need to address the climate crisis.
https://t.co/dre14NVtJ2 https://t.co/Qlh5tvGwEe

Ahead of next week's UN #ClimateAction Summit, young people took part in marches around the world to demand that leaders step up and tackle the climate crisis. https://t.co/LVDXxDT2ie https://t.co/0iuhFc3SJz

🎤 @antonioguterres will take your questions live on @Instagram with host @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador @AidanRGallagher at 12.30pm NY time on Sat 21 Sept.

Don’t miss it! 👉 https://t.co/coM1gcf9if https://t.co/fyI3uL29au

Ahead of next week's #ClimateAction Summit, UN staff & their family members joined people around the world taking part in climate marches to call for urgent action to protect the planet. https://t.co/dre14NDSks https://t.co/SIhyXkiA9H
https://t.co/MmmJI23n3P

Young people joined @antonioguterres, Messengers of Peace @YoYo_Ma & Midori & senior UN officials at the annual UNHQ ceremony for Saturday's #PeaceDay 🕊️ !

Today & every day, we call for #ClimateAction for a more peaceful 🌎: https://t.co/QgoUzZaIm5 https://t.co/8l8ShmmR3X
Travel to the Pacific islands on the front lines of the climate crisis and meet inspiring climate activists ahead of next week's #ClimateAction Summit. https://t.co/h2h63SBUyp https://t.co/RzmpaGd8Bu

"We know that peace is more than just the absence of war. It is about respect, tolerance, and thriving societies in which people live in harmony with each other & with the environment."

-- @antonioguterres at UNHQ #PeaceDay ceremony. https://t.co/n08Mwb9Pbd https://t.co/wPjvSfoGGK

Congratulations to all the 2019 #YoungChamps of the Earth winners!

These young people are taking ambitious #ClimateAction to protect our 🌎. Learn more about their success stories from @UNEnvironment: https://t.co/LvyDxDjtiw https://t.co/n5mH5ZjqJP

Not one country has achieved gender equality yet. But in some countries the gender gap is lower than in others.

Everyone has a role to play in women's empowerment. Find out more from @UN_Women: https://t.co/4hNmdJBOt4 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/26RP83Yy2W
